recipe.title: Jassy Tasty Wraps
recipe.ingredient: Tasty cheese cut in 1 inch x 2 inch strips
recipe.step: Preheat oven to 180C. Cut puff pastry sheet into 6th on each piece spread mustard, then place a small amount of ham and top with cheese. Being two corners together and squeeze so the corners stay together. Brush with egg or milk. Place on a tray lined with paper. Pop in oven for 15 mins or until golden brown. Serve hot- yum!
